availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elexious H. Walker (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. First lieutenant in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 102; KYR-0002-022-0076; Find A Grave, "Elexious H. "Leck" Walker (1835-1913)," Memorial #171116892, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=171116892&ref=acom (accessed May 18, 2017).
